data.title: Oxford Properties
data.subtitle: Integration Developer
data.description: Create data pipelines in Azure's DataFactory using ARM code. Pipeline leverage Data Bricks, Blob storage, REST API calls, and SQL store procedures. Optimized cloud resources for a total savings of $30,000 annually. Pioneered web stack of Next.js, Agility CMS, and Netlify.

data.title: Flight de vol International
data.subtitle: Scrum Master & Project Advisor
data.description: Facilitated Scrum meetings and documentation service. Monitored development team's progress, offered technical know-how on legacy systems, and assisted when problems arose.

data.title: Flight de vol International
data.subtitle: Backend Developer
data.description: Gathered, parsed, cleaned, and stored data into a Postgres database for API usage. Developed APIs using Django REST framework to feed aviation data to the frontend application or perform flight analysis and decoding. Created and managed docker containers that hosted web and data services.

data.title: Internation Medical Solution
data.subtitle: Quality Control Engineer
data.description: Tested software through rigorous procedures to ensure full functionality. Worked with the development team to remedy any identified issues. Wrote reports on tests performed and issues found.
